name: 3-Bar Reversal ATR-Volume Price Action Strategy
description: Trades daily bars of large-cap U.S. equities using a classical 3-bar reversal pattern confirmed by a 20-day ATR filter and 30-day volume surge. Risk is capped via ATR-based stops and a 2:1 reward profile implemented with fixed-percent take profit. Position sizing risks 1.5 % of equity per trade.
